about_the_game:
Many community members asked us "how is the game going to be played?" This playable demo is intended to show the basic aspects of gameplay that will be present in the final release. The demo has the following limitations:
  • no multiplayer capabilities (on the upside there's no requirement for an Internet connection)
  • one single solo mission
  • no support for external text editors
  • Windows 64-bit only

We apologize to our Mac users, but the demo includes a local server component which does not currently run on non-Windows platforms. Stay tuned for updates.

name: Typhon: Bot vs Bot Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX750 / AMD Radeon R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible card
